songs.title: Let U Know
songs.lyrics:
OK

[Verse 1]
I want to let you know
That all this time I spent without you sucks
That everything I used to do, no it's not enough
I just want to let you know
I want to let you know
That I already broke my phone cuz you didn't call
I just want to turn my radio on, and sing my song

[Chorus]
I just want to let you know
I just want to let you know
I just want to let you know

[Verse 1]
I want to let you know
That I never felt us sparring yesterday
That I don't want to refuse, but I will not stay
My body feels so fine, but my mind is still away

[Chorus]
I just want to let you know
I just want to let you know
I just want to let you know

OK

[Bridge]
I don't want to hear your thoughtless speeches
I don't want you to, be afraid
I just want to tell you how much I want to stay
Cuz I want to stay

[Chorus]
I just want to let you know
I just want to let you know
I just want to let you know
Woo!

I just want to let you know

I just want
I just want
I just want
I just want
I just want to let you know
Yeah

And now you know
Yeah!
